def votecount():
    
    t = input()
    
    while (t>0):
        t-=1
        
        n = input()
        
        voteList = []
        nameList = []
        
        
        while (n>0):
            n-=1
            a,b = raw_input().split()
            voteList.append(b)
            nameList.append(a)
        
        voteCount = 0
        
        for i in xrange(len(voteList)):
            
            if (i==0):
                
                if voteList[i] == '+':
                    
                    voteCount += 1
                else:
                    
                    voteCount -= 1
            
            
            else:
                
                if (nameList[i] in (nameList[:i])):
                    
                    dupNameList = []
                    dupVoteList = []
                    for x in xrange(len(nameList[:i])):
                        if nameList[x] == nameList[i]:
                            dupNameList.append(nameList[x])
                            dupVoteList.append(voteList[x])
                    
                    dupNameList.reverse()
                    dupVoteList.reverse()
                    
                    lastVote = dupVoteList[0]
                    
                    
                    if (lastVote == voteList[i]):
                        
                        pass
                    else:
                        
                        if voteList[i]=='+':
                            
                            voteCount += 2
                        else:
                            
                            voteCount -= 2
                    
                else:
                    
                    if (voteList[i] == '+'):
                        
                        voteCount += 1
                    else:
                        
                        voteCount -= 1
                        
        print voteCount

votecount()
